dnn.optimization module¶

class dnn.optimization.Adadelta(model, data, parameters=None)¶

Bases: dnn.optimization.Optimizer

Adadelta optimizer. https://github.com/BRML/climin/blob/master/climin/adadelta.py .. [zeiler2013adadelta] Zeiler, Matthew D.

“ADADELTA: An adaptive learning rate method.” arXiv preprint arXiv:1212.5701 (2012).
class dnn.optimization.GD(model, data, parameters=None)¶

Bases: dnn.optimization.Optimizer

class dnn.optimization.Optimizer(model, data, parameters=None)¶

Bases: object

Default interface for an optimizer implementation - this provides the necessary parameter updates when training a model on a dataset using an online stochastic process. The base framework for performing stochastic gradient descent.

check_criterion()¶
class dnn.optimization.OptimizerParameters(algorithm='Adadelta', n_iterations=50, tolerance=0.99, options=None)¶
dnn.optimization.mix_models(left, right)¶

Se devuelve el resultado de sumar las NeuralLayers de left y right :param left: list of NeuralLayer :param right: list of NeuralLayer :return: list of NeuralLayer
